name: Drop The Square
description:
Drop The Square is a small project I made in Unity for learning purposes.  

Control the white square and try to avoid the RED AREA above you.

Controls :

Left / Right - Arrow Buttons.

Pause game : ESC

** You can play different theme music mix by Press ESC and Click ON button to change music.

**Cheat Code ( Work with Key Pad number ) :
123 : Add more speed.
456 : Power up.
789 : Become invisible.
